lyrics:
2 contributorssunshine lyricsplayin with me baby will get you stung like a bee

i know your never gonna agree love life rollercoaster

leave a light on cry tomorrow
and ill show up
leave a light on cry tomorrow
and let your sunshine
i bet you had a hard life its time to set you free
crying with your green eyes im sorry baby please

solo
sugar my sunshine i want to make you scream
baby your so fine you got ta play with me

your mamas never gonna believe
